create_resource_vents.ponder.tag.resourc: All of the custom and default Resource Vents and their ponders
create_resource_vents.ponder.activate_ve: This is a Dormant Resource Vent. To generate blocks with the Vent, you must activate it.
To activate the Dormant Vent, place a blaze burner above it
Then, fuel the Blaze Burner with a Blaze Cake or any other fuel that Superheats the blaze burner.
After 10 seconds the Dormant Vent will convert into an Active Resource Vent.
create_resource_vents.ponder.automate_ve: This is an Active Resource Vent.
To automate a resource stone with a Resource Vent, supply the vent with it's corresponding in-world reactant block.
This is a Lava source block by default.
